The frontend packageÂ¶

Copyright 2014-2015 Anthony Larcher and Sylvain Meignier

frontend provides methods to process an audio signal in order to extract useful parameters for speaker verification.

The frontend packgae provides tools to extract, normalize and select
acoustic feature frames for speaker recognition. This package includes
4 modules, each dedicated to a different step of the process.
  • Features
  • io
  • Normfeat
  • vad
